message.body: If not, I can still make it today -- just checking. And if tomorrow works for you, I can do any time.
Hey Alison! Tomorrow I could meet you at 8pm, does that work?
Or if you wanted to meet at a later point today I'm free until 8:30
Tomorrow totally works! My schedule is all solo art at the moment, so I'm flexible with time. Tomorrow at 8pm sounds perfect :)
Great! I get done at 7 in nj so if I'm running late i'll letcha know!
Perfect. Thank you for being so flexible!
Yup! I'm there now so come whenever!
